price: Ёлғонга чиқардилар ва ҳавойи нафсларига эргашдилар. Ҳар бир иш ўз жойидадир.
arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakadhabū wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
